content: {"name": "Salt and Sea Mission Church, Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Tickets are distributed at 10am. this might change depending on how fast the line starts forming, so you are advised to arrive early.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.coalitionforthehomeless.org/resources/salt-and-sea-mission/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2417 Stillwell Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11223", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5884918, "longitude": -73.9834047}, "phones": [{"number": "(917) 873-9261", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "New clients are asked to come at 10 am"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "1 person per household only"}]}
